code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../css/navbar.css';import{userContext}from'../context/Usercontext';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const{handleClick,data,fatchData}=useContext(userContext);const[selectedItem,setSelectedItem]=useState(null);const handleCatagory=index=>{setSelectedItem(index);};useEffect(()=>{fatchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-outer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:"RANGER POS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-brands fa-opencart"})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mobile-outer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"mobile-nav-inner",children:data.map((_ref,index)=>{let{categoryDescription,id}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/"+categoryDescription+"/"+id,style:selectedItem===index?{background:"#ede7f6",color:"#5e35b1",boxShadow:"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 3px 3px -2px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14) 0px 3px 4px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 1px 8px 0px"}:{},className:"catagory-name",onClick:()=>handleCatagory(index),children:categoryDescription})});})})})]})});}export default Navbar;
